group_1.textCenter: Mom, are you okay?! What about Shizuka's mother?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'm fine. Thanks, Chiharu...
That's a Diviner for you... I don't think I'll ever be @able to close that gap.

group_1.textLeft: No, you did an awesome job just now!

group_1.textRight: Ha, thanks.

group_1.textLeft: Why haven't you two escaped?
I searched all over the place, but didn't find anyone else.

group_1.textRight: Of course, we evacuated with the others...
But those monsters came out of our shadows on the way,
and then we were left behind.
Though we have no idea why they chose to target @us...
So, Chiharu.

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: Don't "hm?" me! Where on EARTH did you go?!

group_1.textLeft: Eek!

group_1.textRight: You just vanished all of a sudden, @and never came back!
And now there's monsters popping up! Do you have any idea how worried I was...?!

group_1.textLeft: Um... I'm sorry...
I was worried about the coming-of-age ceremony, @so I went to see.
Then Shizuka and I got pushed into the @waterfall basin...

group_1.textRight: Into the waterfall basin...?!
Who would do that...?! Are you hurt at all...?!

group_1.textLeft: I'm fine! Physically. You saw me take out those Underlings, right?

group_1.textRight: Er, do you mean to say you got pushed during the ceremony...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
It's like, the coming-of-age ceremony was a Diviner-killing ceremony...
And we get turned into Devils...

group_1.textRight: Thisâ€• is all a little much for me to process. Shizuka's alright, yes?
She said she would contact me...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we came back together.

group_1.textRight: ...Just leave the details until we evacuate to the @house.

group_1.textLeft: Then we'd better take the dancer I saw just now, too.

group_1.textRight: Dancer?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, she collapsed just a minute ago...

group_1.textRight: Nobody's there, though...?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?
You're right...

group_1.textRight: Was there actually anyone...?

group_1.textLeft: Uh, YEAH!

group_1.textRight: Into thin air, huh...?
That's certainly strange, but we've got another @strange thing to deal with...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102600:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]...
Why do they keep tracking us like this?

group_1.textRight: Right. That.

group_1.textLeft: You'll be able to take it a little easier from now on, though.

group_1.textRight: Yes. We're here, too.

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka...!

group_1.textRight: I'm back, Mother. We'll tell you the details in a @moment.

group_1.textLeft: We were just talking about that!
